herefore,  considering  all  the  material  submitted  to  this  Court  and  after  hearing  the
submissions of the learned Counsel, this Court is of the view that the Petitioner has failed
to establish a prima facie case to enable  this  Court to  issue notice. Accordingly, for the
reasons stated above this Court is not inclined to issue formal notice on the Respondents
and proceed to dismiss this Application.
Judge of the Court of Appeal
Judge of the Court of Appeal
